mapper.select: SELECT comp_code, comp_name, comp_addr, comp_tel, comp_isExist from supply_company
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supply_company (comp_code, comp_name, comp_addr, comp_tel, comp_isExist) VALUES (#{compCode},#{compName},#{compAddr},#{compTel},#{compIsExist})
mapper.update: UPDATE supply_company SET comp_isExist=FALSE WHERE comp_code=#{compCode}
